title: On the world‚Äôs most powerful seat: Ivanka sits behind Oval Office desk | world-news | Hindustan Times
text:
On the world‚Äôs most powerful seat: Ivanka sits behind Oval Office desk world Updated: Feb 14, 2017 20:00 IST Washington The first daughter posted the picture on Twitter , Instagram and Facebook.((Ivanka Trump‚Äôs Twitter account)) 
Ivanka Trump is getting a strong reaction online after posting a photo of herself seated at the Oval Office desk while her father, President Donald Trump, and Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, stood on either side of her. 
The first daughter posted the picture on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook with the message, ‚ÄúA great discussion with two world leaders about the importance of women having a seat at the table!‚Äù A great discussion with two world leaders about the importance of women having a seat at the table! üá∫üá∏üá®üá¶ pic.twitter.com/AtiSiOoho0 ‚Äî Ivanka Trump (@IvankaTrump) February 13, 2017 
While the picture earned Trump plenty of kudos from supporters of her father on social media, others said she hadn‚Äôt earned the right to sit behind the desk. 
Ivanka Trump sat next to Trudeau during a roundtable meeting with female executives from the US and Canada on Monday. Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau (left) speaks during a roundtable discussion while Ivanka Trump (centre) and TransAlta Coproration CEO and president Dawn Farrell (right ) look on at the White House in Washington on February 13 (REUTERS) tags
